sec.p: Native to the east coast of North America and Central America, distributed along the Atlantic coast of Newfoundland and Labrador to Texas, the Atlantic coast of Mexico, and throughout the Caribbean Islands (e.g., Barkworth 2003, Beetle 1977, Howard et al. 1989, Liogier and Martorell 2000, Peterson 2001). It has been introduced to coastal regions in Spain ( Campos et al. 2004, SanLe√≥n et al. 1999, Prieto et al. 2011), China ( An et al. 2007), North Africa, and the west coast of the United States (Oregon, Washington), and Canada (British Columbia).
